text:
CCLock, CCUnlock and Clearcase should probably agree on one capitalization 
plan for the method getObjSelect, being as the classes are related by 
inheritance.
creator: dbrosius@apache.org
mbenson@apache.org
text:
probably whatever is chosen as "correct" should be made as an addition on 
whichever class does not override with the proper name to preserve API BC, even 
though I would consider this a bug.
